info.description: Flow output node for defining how results are delivered

nodeId.description: Unique identifier for this node within the flow

name.description: Display name for this output node

description.description: Description of what this output node produces

saveToFile.description: Whether to save output to a file

filePath.description: File path template for saving output. Use {{variableName}} for interpolation

fileName.description: File name template for saving output

includeMetadata.description: Whether to include execution metadata in output

includeTimestamp.description: Whether to include timestamp in output

transformTemplate.description: Optional template for transforming the final output

webhookHeaders.description: Headers to send with webhook request

position.description: UI position coordinates for the node
